verses.name: 1 Samuel 1:8
verses.text: Then said Elkanah her husband to her, Hannah, why weepest thou? and why eatest thou not? and why is thy heart grieved? am not I better to thee than ten sons?

verses.name: 1 Samuel 1:9
verses.text: So Hannah rose up after they had eaten in Shiloh, and after they had drunk. Now Eli the priest sat upon a seat by a post of the temple of the Lord.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 1:10
verses.text: And she was in bitterness of soul, and prayed unto the Lord, and wept sore.
